scenes.description: Hajime Todoroki performs the song 'Countach' on a 3D stage with backup dancers. The screen shows high-energy visuals and lighting effects.
An instrumental transition scene with a focus on choreography and stage lighting as the performance switches between songs.
Hajime Todoroki performs 'BANZAI'. Stylized lyrics appear as on-screen text throughout this segment, synchronized with the singing.
